about_the_game:
Roll, bounce, and slam your way through various handcrafted levels in this puzzle-platformer adventure!

Huecube features:

  • Puzzles & Platforming -- Play it your way!
    Some levels offer more movement-centric challenges, some more focused on head-scratching conundrums, and others a mix of both! Pick and choose which levels you tackle! In Huecube, you aren't forced to complete every single level to progress.

  • Level editor + Steam workshop
    With an integrated and robust level editor, you can create your very own full-fledged Huecube levels which can be optionally shared on the Steam workshop!
    Not into making your own levels? You can try your hand at completing other levels made by the community instead!

  • Easy to pick up, fun to master!
    With few movement controls, it's easy to get into! Move laterally, jump, and slam -- that's all! Enough practice and you can turn simple moves into an advanced repertoire of sequences.

  • Satisfying and fluid movement!
    Chain together slam jumps into wall bounces, or gather speed and use the start of your slam move for extra distance!

  • Collectibles
    Throughout each level are optional collectibles scattered about. They may demand a tricky jump, or to think outside the box. Challenge yourself and try and get them all!

  • Skins
    Steam inventory integration - When you play you may acquire various cosmetic skins for your colourful cube!

Don't forget to add Huecube to your wishlist!
